## Coming soon

This tutorial will guide you through training your first classification model with Xorq.

You will learn how to use the Step and Pipeline classes to build and train a model.

**What you'll learn:**
- Load a dataset for training
- Create a Step with a classifier
- Fit the model to data
- Make predictions
- Evaluate basic metrics

Check back soon for the complete tutorial.
